title: WhatsApp for iOS will soon make it easier to see file transfer progress
content:
At the end of March, 9to5Mac reported that WhatsApp started testing the ability to send files up to 2GB on the app. While its beta testing is still limited to Argentina, there’s another feature that may be coming to users in the near future – the ability to see the file transfer progress.

more…

The post WhatsApp for iOS will soon make it easier to see file transfer progress appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp is testing another feature it could land soon for iPhone users, the ability to see the file transfer progress of a document.
